Schema Operations¶

The schema holds table definitions

Schema¶

class rgma.Schema(vdbName)¶

A schema allows tables to be created and their definitions manipulated for a specific VDB.

Parameter:vdbName (string) – name of VDB
createIndex(createIndexStatement)¶

Creates an index on a table.

Parameter:createIndexStatement (string) – SQL CREATE INDEX statement
createTable(createTableStatement, authzRules)¶

Creates a table in the schema.

Parameters:
  • createTableStatement (string) – SQL CREATE TABLE statement
  • authzRules (string or [ string ]) – authorization rule or list of authorization rules
createView(createViewStatement, authzRules)¶

Creates a view on a table.

Parameters:
  • createViewStatement (string) – SQL CREATE VIEW statement
  • authzRules (string or [ string ]) – authorization rules or list of authorization rules
dropIndex(tableName, indexName)¶

Drops an index from a table.

Parameters:
  • tableName (string) – name of table with index to drop
  • indexName (string) – name of index to drop
dropTable(tableName)¶

Drops a table from the schema.

Parameter:tableName (string) – name of table to drop
dropView(viewName)¶

Drops a view from the schema.

Parameter:viewName (string) – name of view to drop
getAllTables()¶

Gets a list of all tables and views in the schema.

Returns:list of string with names of all tables and views in the schema
getAuthorizationRules(tableName)¶

Gets the authorization rules for a table or view.

Parameter:tableName (string) – name of table
Returns:[ string ]
getTableDefinition(tableName)¶

Gets the definition for the named table or view.

Parameter:viewName (string) – name of view to drop
Returns:rgma.TableDefinition
getTableIndexes(tableName)¶

Gets the list of indexes for a table.

Parameter:tableName (string) – name of table
Returns:rgma.Index
setAuthorizationRules(tableName, authzRules)¶

Sets the authorization rules for the given table or view.

Parameters:
  • tableName (string) – name of table
  • authzRules (string or [ string ]) – authorization rules or list of authorization rules

TableDefinition¶

class rgma.TableDefinition¶

Definitions of a table, including table name and column details.

getColumns()¶

Returns the column definitions for this table.

Returns:[ rgma.ColumnDefinition ] column definitions for this table
getTableName()¶

Returns the name of this table.

Returns:a string with the name of this table
getViewFor()¶
Returns name of table for which this is a view or None.
isView()¶

Returns true if this is a view rather than a table.

Returns:True if this is a view rather than a table

ColumnDefinition¶

class rgma.ColumnDefinition¶

Definition of a column which may be used inside a rgma.TableDefinition.

getName()¶

Returns the name of the column.

Returns:a string with the name of the column
getSize()¶

Returns the size of the column type.

Returns:the size of the column type (or 0 if none is specified)
getType()¶

Returns the type of the column.

Returns:rgma.RGMAType as the type of the column
isNotNull()¶

Returns the NOT NULL flag.

Returns:True if column is NOT NULL
isPrimaryKey()¶

Returns the PRIMARY KEY flag.

Returns:True if column is PRIMARY KEY

Index¶

class rgma.Index¶

Information about an index on a table.

getIndexName()¶

Returns the name of this index.

Returns:string
getColumnNames()¶

Returns the list of column names used by this index.

Returns:[ string ]

RGMAType¶

class rgma.RGMAType¶

Constants for SQL column types.

INTEGER¶
REAL¶
DOUBLE¶
CHAR¶
VARCHAR¶
TIMESTAMP¶
DATE¶
TIME¶
